document_data.name: Baulaukiir
document_data.mainbody: '''Baulaukiir''' was a powerful merchant family of [[Archenbridge]].
document_data.Activities: It was said that the Baulaukiirs as well as the [[Ithrymm]], and the [[Tantal]] families outshone [[Sembia|Sembian]] merchants in trade.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Baulaukiirs had a grand family estate in Archenbridge.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Baulaukiirs were considered one of the wealthiest and most powerful families on Archenbridge.
